content: adorable heart crochet coasters that will look great in your space all year long a stack of them also works wonderfully as a thoughtful gift for valentine s day or any other gift-giving occasion this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy finished size approximately 4 wide and 3 tall without fringe and 6 wide and 5 tall with the fringe hook size us size 7 4 5 mm yarn samples used category 4 worsted weight yarn main stitches chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet the pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy-to-read printable and ad-free version of the pattern https //www stitching-together com/crochet-heart-coaster/ 1 1 https //www stitching-together com/crochet-heart-coaster/
